title: Pirate Flag
description: A skull and crossbones displayed on a black flag, used on pirate ships, also known as a Jolly Roger.
apple_vendor_description: The pirate flag emoji on Apple devices is a stark and bold representation of the Jolly Roger, rendered with a dramatic contrast that accentuates its menacing design. Apple‚Äôs characteristic 3D shading gives the skull and crossbones a tactile, almost menacing presence, with realistic lighting that highlights the tattered edges of the black flag. It's frequently employed to signify adventure, rebellion, mischief, or a sense of daring exploration in digital conversations.
